title: Remove all images/portraits/logos from portfolio UI and republish

requirements.summary: Remove all rendered images from the UI and replace image-based visuals with CSS gradients/shapes/text while keeping the layout responsive and visually balanced.
acceptanceCriteria: No pages render any elements (Home, About, Services, Skills, Portfolio, Contact, Header, Footer).
The Home hero section uses a CSS-based background (e.g., gradient) instead of loading /assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png.
Header and Footer do not load /assets/generated/logo-sti.dim_512x512.png; replace with a text-only brand mark.
No broken-image icons/empty image frames/portrait borders remain visible after image removal.
All pages remain responsive and visually balanced after removing the right-side portrait column/space.

file_operations.description: Remove the hero background that loads /assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png and replace it with a CSS-only background (gradient/overlay layers); remove the hero portrait area so no can render and the section remains visually balanced.
Remove the logo that loads /assets/generated/logo-sti.dim_512x512.png and replace it with a text-only brand mark while preserving spacing/alignment in desktop and mobile navigation.
Remove the footer logo that loads /assets/generated/logo-sti.dim_512x512.png and replace it with a text-only brand mark; ensure footer layout remains clean without any image frames.
Remove the right-side portrait column and update the page grid/layout to a single-column content layout (or equivalent) so no portrait space remains and responsiveness is preserved.
Remove the right-side portrait column and adjust layout spacing so the services grid and CTA remain visually balanced across breakpoints without any reserved portrait area.
Remove the right-side portrait column and adjust the grid so skill sections render full-width appropriately with no unused portrait column on large screens.
Remove the right-side portrait column and adjust layout so filters and project grid occupy the available width cleanly on all breakpoints.
Remove the right-side portrait column and adjust the contact page layout so the form and info sections remain balanced and responsive with no unused portrait space.

requirements.summary: Remove/disable all portrait-related components and configuration so they are not imported or rendered anywhere in the app.
acceptanceCriteria: No page imports or renders RightSidePortrait (currently used in HeroSection and all main pages).

SectionCornerPortrait and SectionMediumPortrait are not rendered anywhere in the app (directly or indirectly).
